titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Lewis Pelly to the Private Secretary to the Governor General of India

mods.abstract: Letter requesting that responses be solicited to some questions previously submitted to His Excellency the Viceroy of India (Earl Canning).These questions included: how much pay Pelly should draw for the period he undertook his special duty; the sanctioning of repayment of sums expended by Pelly whilst travelling and for the costs of sending telegrams; that arrangements be made for Mirza Zein ool Abadin [Zayn al-'Abidin]; the gifts of rifles be sanctioned for two Sirdars; and proposing that a translation be sent to the ruler of Herat of a letter which Pelly had drafted at the Governor General's instruction.
